messages.content: It doesn’t matter if you voted for me or not, I’m here to make sure that everyone in Welwyn Hatfield is represented both locally and nationally

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Grant is proud to support local charities across Welwyn Hatfield, acting as a supporter and even patron to several.
Grant uses the train most days and has made powerful representations over Railway Timetable changes for Welwyn Hatfield. Grant has received a commitment for Oyster to be introduced through to WGC.
Grant looks at the recent communication infrastructure changes across the constituency, visits business growth and home usage, helping to raise local education.
Although Grant personally voted Remain, he made a choice and is committed to working towards the best Brexit possible.

issues.brexitEurope: Working to ensure our Brexit outcome results in the full completion of free trade deals with countries outside of Europe.
issues.education: Grant looks at the recent communication infrastructure changes across the constituency, visiting local education projects.
issues.transport: Grant uses the train most days and has made powerful representations over Railway Timetable changes for Welwyn Hatfield.
issues.socialWelfare: Supporting local charities and raising support for various community activities.

community.content: Grant is passionate about local community projects and charities, visiting as many as possible and participating in fundraising. Grant participated in The Welwyn Hatfield Ride, helping to raise money for the NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: Local man, Grant Shapps, is well known for being an extremely hardworking Member of Parliament, who was born and bred in Hertfordshire. Grant and his family have a real stake in our community.

contactInformation.address: FREEPOST ANG 9918, Maynard House, The Common, Hatfield, AL10 0BR

images.caption: Grant Shapps: Delivering for all of Welwyn Hatfield

personalStories.story: Grant started a web design company from scratch at the age of 21.
